# teamcity_context_parameters (Resource)

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "teamcity_context_parameters" "project1" {
  project_id = "Project1"
  params     = {
    a = "1"
    b = "user"
  }
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `project_id` (String) Project ID
- `params` (Map of String)
